about_the_game:
Revasion is a minimalistic action arcade game with an energetic soundtrack. A challenging colorful bullet hell survival experience.

Rotate to dodge hazards and bounce back oncoming balls. Simple controls, hard to master.

A hybrid gameplay experience inspired by bullet hell and breakout classics.

Extra Game Modes

Survive long enough and you'll unlock up to four bonus endless game modes for play.
  • Rebounce: Destroy all blocks and keep the ball on screen!
  • Evasion: Survive a never-ending bullet hell barrage!
  • Tension: You only have one block at a time. Keep the ball on screen!
  • Reaction: Ball changes colour every bounce, bounce it off the correct block!
